GET /.desc: returns static test page with link to API documentation

GET /api/.desc: returns static page with API documentation

GET /api/teachers/:id.desc: returns one teacher respresented by his id

POST /api/teachers.desc: create and returns a new teacher uisng the posted object as the teacher

PUT /api/teachers/:id.desc: updates and returns the matching teacher with the posted update object

DELETE /api/teachers/:id.desc: deletes and returns the matching teacher

GET /api/classes/:id.desc: returns one class respresented by its id

POST /api/classes.desc: create and returns a new class using the posted object as the class

PUT /api/classes/:id.desc: updates and returns the matching class with the posted update object

DELETE /api/classes/:id.desc: deletes and returns the matching class

GET /api/books/:id.desc: returns one book respresented by its id

POST /api/books.desc: create and returns a new book uisng the posted object as the book

PUT /api/books/:id.desc: updates and returns the matching book with the posted update object

DELETE /api/books/:id.desc: deletes and returns the matching book

GET /api/students/:id.desc: returns one student respresented by its id

POST /api/students.desc: create and returns a new student uisng the posted object as the student

PUT /api/students/:id.desc: updates and returns the matching student with the posted update object

DELETE /api/students/:id.desc: deletes and returns the matching student

GET /api/classes/:id/teachers.desc: returns all teachers for one class respresented by its id

GET /api/classes/:id/books.desc: returns all books for one class respresented by its id

GET /api/classes/:id/students.desc: returns all students for one class respresented by its id
